summary: STARTED THE CAR UP AND GOT A WARNING TO: SERVICE POWER STEERING. DRIVE WITH CAUTION. TURNED CAR OFF AND ON THREE TINES BEFORE THE MESSAGE WENT AWAY AND STEERING WAS BACK TO NORMAL. THIS IS THE SECOND TIME MY POWER STEERING HAS FAILED. FIRST FAILURE WAS 09/04/16 WHERE STEERING GEAR WAS REPLACED. IT IS NOW DOING THE SAME THING IT DID WHEN IT FIRST HAPPENED IN 2016.  STEERING IS VERY DIFFICULT WITHOUT THE POWER ASSIST.
